Tutorial¶

  1. fitz setup
  2. Copy data into data directory.
  3. Setup your design file.
  4. fitz run -w workflows

Setup¶

Fitz includes a script to create the FITZ_DIR/project.py file to specify directories and some project options.

First, create a directory for your project. For NW Labs this should be in /ncf/jwb/studies/<StudyName>/Analyses).

mkdir project
mkdir project/fitz
cd project/fitz
fitz setup
*answer questions or accept defaults*
